comments.content:
Pick me! I have interest.

Just call me Abel. I like people call my Eng name.

How call u? XX?

first.content: Hi Abel, you can friend me :)

last.content: Ok I got it. And I have to say bye bye for a week. I want to go to see my family in Tainan. And tell me what's ur plan in holiday. Do u got 4day?
last.name: Abel-Yang

last.content: I hav no plan for the holiday...

comments.content:
Being an interpreter sounds like a tough job. I consider myself fulent in both Chinese and English, but can never imagine pursuing that line of jobs, too many subtleties to look out inside a message.
Wish you the best of luck, and feel free to add me.

first.content: I'm not taking interpreter as a career goal, just want to reach that kind of standard. My Eng is not as fluent as you I believe, and I just want to get to a higher level.
first.name: X_X
